text: Timofey Pavlovich Mozgov (born July 16, 1986) is a Russian professional basketball player. He currently plays center for the Cleveland Cavaliers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Mozgov is from St. Petersburg, Russia. He is 7 foot 1 inches tall. Mozgov also played for the New York Knicks and the Denver Nuggets. Mozgov played in the 2012 London Olympics. His team won the bronze medal. He first came into the NBA on October 27, 2010. His jersey number is 20. Mozgov also played for Khimki Moscow Region. On June 4, 2015, he became the first Russian to play in the NBA Finals. == References == Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Brooklyn Nets players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Cleveland Cavaliers players Category:Denver Nuggets players Category:Los Angeles Lakers players Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:New York Knicks players Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Russia Category:Russian basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Saint Petersburg
title: Timofey Mozgov
